original_text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ, that his soul was not left in hell, neither his flesh did see corruption.
korean_text: 미리 본 고로 그리스도의 부활을 말하되 그가 음부에 버림이 되지 않고 그의 육신이 썩음을 당하지 아니하시리라 하더니

sentences.original_text: that his soul was not left in hell
neither his flesh did see corruption
